title: PES RR CAMPUS AIML VS EC CAMPUS CSE
content: In terms of placements, internships and exposure in terms of clubs etc

comments.body: the first aiml batch is yet to appear placements though there probably wont be any difference

This question has been answered in FAQ  


Refer to that

Ec cse has a slight advantage due to it being core. (Aiml still covers all core courses tho). If travel time is same then I'd say ec cs otherwise just pick whatever is closer. Imo it's a small difference
Well im going to to be staying in the hostels, but thank you
